last_episode_to_air.name: Are You Sure This Is What You Want?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ben and Dedra try to stay active in the swinger lifestyle even though they are going forward with their pregnancy plans; Brittany and Cody's date with Mike and Missy has disastrous repercussions; and Ben's birthday bash is ruined because of Brittany's downward spiral.

name: Neighbors with Benefits
overview: This real-life series follows the residents of an average suburban community in Ohio where the couples maintain a not-so-average way of life. Neighbors are often more than just friends in this seemingly ordinary neighborhood that has become home to the controversial, yet surprisingly common "swinger" lifestyle.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: Swingers Tony and Diana attempt to recruit new neighbors to join their freewheeling lifestyle.

episodes.name: Not Hiding Anymore
episodes.overview: Diana and Lori become the subjects of gossip; Lori makes a tearful confession to her mother; complications arise when Tony and Diana go on a date with Ben and Dedra.

episodes.name: The Doctor Is In
episodes.overview: Brittany and Cody look for a fresh start but can't avoid returning to their dangerous habits; Tony becomes jealous when Diana meets an attractive doctor; a guilt-ridden Lori meets with a pastor.

episodes.name: Are You Sure This Is What You Want?
episodes.overview: Ben and Dedra try to stay active in the swinger lifestyle even though they are going forward with their pregnancy plans; Brittany and Cody's date with Mike and Missy has disastrous repercussions; and Ben's birthday bash is ruined because of Brittany's downward spiral.
